document_data.caption: A map showing Gorl Street and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Gorl Street
document_data.mainbody: '''Gorl Street''' was a small road that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Gorl Street was located in the central section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It originated on the the [[Street of Glances]] where it branched southwest to end on the [[Street of the Singing Dolphin]] just one building north of [[Ivory Street]]. Gorl Street also connected with [[Sniff Alley]] and [[Staghunter's Way]].
